content:
I need to create a large number of realms (70-80) which all have the same organisation permissions/settings (that are different from the default). I see that when I use the generate_realm_creation_link flow I can base the new organisation off an old one, but when using the create_realm management command it just uses the default settings.

Is there some way to copy the settings when using create_realm ? If not, would the best way to copy the settings between realms to use something like this code: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/blob/159449b448808ebf80caa922aaca18e58cf2741c/zerver/actions/create_realm.py#L82
@Jeremy Herbert yeah, I think that'd be a good hook to modify to do what you're trying to do.
Thank you for the reply, I will do that!
